page.title: 02NATURE IN AND AROUND MYDDLE
page.content:
{TREES Most of the trees around {Myddle }are {Oaks.}By the{brook}there are a few {Weeping Willows.}The fencing is usually post and wire but ocassionally there is a{hawthorne}hedge. There are quite a few{hawthorne}trees too.
{ BIRDS There are alot of{tits}around{ {Myddle.}There is alot of{Bluetits}and quite a few of{Greattits}and{Coaltits. {Blackbirds}and{Sparrows}are quite popular as well. There is a pair of {Goldfiches}and{Chaffinches}too.
{POOLS There is Pike in {Marton Pool}that kills the ducklings that are meant for shooting.{Fenemere}is very cold and very deep and not very much happens there.
